help.title: What is Browser Connector?
help.description: Browser Connector sends your voice transcriptions directly to AI chat interfaces (like ChatGPT, Claude) through the <link>Handy Connector</link> Chrome extension.
help.feature1: Speak and send messages directly to ChatGPT or other AI chats
help.feature2: Use "Send + Selection" to include selected text as context
help.feature3: Optional LLM processing before sending (e.g., translate, reformat)
help.feature4: YOU MUST CHANGE PASSWORD IN SETTINGS - SAME PASSWORD HERE AND IN EXTENSION. OTHERWISE YOUR MESSAGES ARE AT RISK OF BEING SPYED ON BY ANY WEBSITE WHICH KNOWS DEFAULT PASSWORD!

status.title: Extension Connection
status.description: Real-time connection status with the browser extension.

sendPrompts.description: Optional: Process transcription through LLM before sending. Leave empty to send raw transcription.

systemPrompt.description: System prompt for LLM processing. Leave empty to skip LLM and send raw transcription.
systemPrompt.placeholder: E.g.: Translate the following text to English and fix grammar errors.

sendSelectionPrompts.title: Send + Selection Prompts
sendSelectionPrompts.description: Process voice instruction and selected text through LLM before sending.

systemPrompt.title: System Prompt

userPrompt.title: User Prompt Template
userPrompt.description: Template for the user message sent to LLM.

autoOpen.title: Auto-Open Tab
autoOpen.description: Automatically open a new browser tab when no tab is bound to the extension. This allows seamless hands-free sending without manually selecting a tab first.

enabled.label: Enable Auto-Open
enabled.description: Opens ChatGPT/Claude automatically if no tab has the Handy Connector extension active.
